code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Retail_CustomerLoyalty] --> Idle
    Idle --> Connecting: connect(Retail_OrderManagement)
    Connecting --> Connected: connection_ok(Retail_CouponSystem)
    Connecting --> Error: connection_error(Retail_OrderManagement)
    Connected --> Authenticated: authenticate(Retail_Inventory)
    Connected --> Error: auth_timeout(Retail_PointOfSale)
    Authenticated --> Ready: init_complete(Retail_Inventory)
    Authenticated --> Error: init_error(Retail_PointOfSale)
    Ready --> Idle: disconnect(Retail_CouponSystem)
    Error --> Idle: reset(Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    Ready --> Transmitting: send_data(Retail_Inventory)
    Transmitting --> Ready: transmission_complete(Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    Transmitting --> Error: transmission_error(Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
